name: Individual Histories of Edmonton-area People with Japanese Heritage (2013-2015)

creator.name: Edmonton Japanese Community Association History Committee

author.name: Edmonton Japanese Community Association History Committee

description: A collection of personal histories of Edmonton-area people with Japanese heritage (e.g. Japanese-Canadian, Japanese citizens who have spent time in Edmonton area). These are based on responses to the the 2013 EJCA community survey and augmented with information collected later.
